text:
imited-Stage Small Cell Lung Cancer     - Extensive-Stage Small Cell Lung Cancer
                
                
                    After small cell lung cancer has been diagnosed, tests are done to find out if cancer cells have spread within the chest or to other parts of the body.
                    The process used to find out if cancer has spread within the chest or to other parts of the body is called staging. The information gathered from the staging process determines the stage of the
